data.prayer: Father, you know every soul, and you know who are yours and who are yet to be yours out of the 72,100 people living in Toa Alta, Puerto Rico. Please, call your lost sheep to yourself.
data.verse: For I will take you out of the nations; I will gather you from all the countries and bring you back into your own land.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Toa Alta, Puerto Rico
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, please help the 23,442 believers in the state of Toa Alta to be filled with joyful obedience at all times, as you modeled for us all.

data.section_summary: On average, 4 people will die without a personal relationship with Jesus in the next 100 hours in Toa Alta, Puerto Rico.
data.prayer: Lord, send your gospel to these.
Father, show your mercy on the 48,658 people in Toa Alta who are far from you. Please add 14 new house churches this year.
Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the state of Toa Alta, Puerto Rico.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Pájaros
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Pájaros, Toa Alta, Puerto Rico.
Lord, you already know the names of the prophets you want to raise up in Toa Alta. Please, raise them up and give them the courage to speak your truth to your church.
data.verse: Before I formed you in the womb I knew you, and before you were born I consecrated you; I appointed you a prophet to the nations.

data.prayer: Father, be a refuge and strength for the hurting in Toa Alta, Puerto Rico today.
data.verse: God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.

data.section_summary:
the state of Toa Alta, Puerto Rico has a population of 72,100.

We estimate Toa Alta has 23,442 people who might know Jesus, 44,727 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 3,931 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 3 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, let it be said of the 48,658 lost in Toa Alta that you have called them out of darkness into your glorious light.
data.verse: But you are a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for God’s own possession, that you may proclaim the excellence of him who called you out of darkness into his marvelous light
